effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. During hail, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. During hail, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.

short_effect.x_y: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

flavor_text.x_y: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
